plugin.name: kickstartWithBootstrap
plugin.author: Joerg Rech
plugin.title: Good looking web project setup with Bootstrap!
plugin.description:
\

Introduction

Kickstart is an extension for Grails in order to start with a good looking template for your project. It provides adapted scaffolding templates for standard web pages (using the Bootstrap web page template by Twitter)

Usage

After installation you can call "grails installKickstartScaffolding" which will copy several files into your project. It will overwrite only few files (e.g., in conf and ) but you should use it only on new Grails projects (I only tested version 1.3.7!).

Notes:

  • Does only use plain Bootstrap (currently, without Less)
  • The plugin copies the files into your project - you can uninstall it thereafter.
